remarks: This theorem is in fact a copy of ~ wl-syl6 , and repeated here to demonstrate a recursive proof scheme.  The number '2' in the theorem name indicates that a chain of length 2 is modified.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 6-Jul-2019.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-impchain-mp-2.1 $e |- ( th -> ( ch -> ps ) ) $.
wl-impchain-mp-2.2 $e |- ( ps -> ph ) $.
wl-impchain-mp-2 $p |- ( th -> ( ch -> ph ) ) $.
